review:
Bags are big. One can arrange many clothes or other things in it.
As a storage of fabrics, I have found it very useful one. Already purchased 6.Those bags are made up of good materials. Go for it.

Great product !!! Strong and sturdy. Very useful if you are going for a long journey by vehicle and you have too much stuff to carry as it helps to save the car boot space and at home it is also very useful to organize things as well.

review_title: Strong sturdy bags good for large storage
review: When I opened these bags I had no idea how much they can accommodate but when I started putting stuff i was amazed at the capacity of the bag. I ordered it to store my woolens during Summers and I was able to accommodate the woolens for two adults in it. I could keep 4 down jackets, atleast 8-10 thermals, 4-5 sweaters, gloves, shawls, woolen socks, sweatshirts, ear muffsin one bag. The second bag is still unused..

I like the size , zip quality as well as the material used inside the bag
Overall perfect for storage

review_title: Spacious but handle stitching needs to be better
review: I bought 1 then 3 more and now waiting for 5th. Its spacious and the material is good. Just that the stitching of the handles needs to be sturdier and one has to be careful not to rip them when the bags are heavily filled.
i have ordered 4 covers and those are very good in quality and perfect in size....
